expected_output: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase with original receipt and packaging.
success_criteria: Mentions 30-day window|Mentions receipt requirement|Mentions packaging requirement

input: I received a damaged item in my order.
expected_output: I sincerely apologize for the damaged item. I'll arrange a replacement immediately and provide a prepaid return label for the damaged product.
